name: script-helper
description: Helper for creating and maintaining boilerplates, configurations and script modules for npm projects

scripts.file: f() { P=$1; P=${P/src/lib}; P=${P/.ts/.js}; tsc-watch --onSuccess "node -r source-map-support/register ${P}"; }; f
scripts.prebuild:doc:
npm run postbuild:doc && svn export https://github.com/ozum/resettable-file/trunk/src src/resettable-file && sed -i '' $'s/@classdesc/@classdesc\
 * @private/' src/resettable-file/resettable-file.ts
scripts.release: git checkout master && git pull origin master && standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.squash: BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` && git checkout master && git merge --squash $BRANCH && npm run commit
scripts.watch: concurrently 'npm run build -- --watch' 'npm run test -- --watch' | awk '{gsub(/\033c/,"") system("")}1'
